design.title: Design
design.text: Hi! I’m Mariano, but in the matrix of the internet, I go by Dot Dager. I’m a full-stack developer, content creator, and a firm      believer that cats make the best coding partners (any bugs in my code are definitely their fault).

project1.title: Gato que Araña
project1.description: A game where the cat rules and you're just its toy. You thought you were in control, but the only one winning here is the cat.

project2.title: Princi-Pito
project2.description: A website so simple it'll make you question your life choices. Did you really want to see this? Well, here you are, trapped.

project3.title: LumberJack
project3.description: The game that consumes your life in an infinite loop of addictive madness. How did you stop playing? I don’t know, there’s probably no hope left.
